title: FAMJAM4000
lyrics:
9 ContributorsFAMJAM4000 Lyrics[Verse 1]
You watched me grow up from a boy
I watched you build from what's destroyed
Rehabbin' houses but held grudges when my mom's house wasn't yours
She had to build somethin' of her own
We disagree on right and wrong
Been on and off communicatin' since the day I left from home

[Pre-Chorus]
And as we get older it's hard to reach understandin'
I left with no Plan "B", oh, no
Yeah, I could be all around the world
But without family, it don't mean anything
[Chorus]
Can we bring the love back?
I know that you've been waitin' so long
For it to come home again
Can we bring the love back?
I know that it's been way too long
You've always been home to me, always home

[Verse 2]
I miss you dancin' with a drink in your hand
You got drunk, and never called me again
But you've seen sides that nobody else knows
I need you 'round to see my kids grow old
Patience, these curses on generations
Let's fall back in love and break 'em
Nothing's past a conversation
There's always space for you
You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
'Cause as we get older it's hard to reach understandin'
See life with no Plan "B", oh, woah
Yeah, I could be all around the world
But without family it don't mean anything

[Chorus]
Can we bring the love back?
I know that you've been waitin' so long
For it to come home again
Can we bring the love back?
I know that it's been way too long
You've always been home to me, always home (Always home)

[Instrumental Break]
(Always home)

[Chorus]
Can we bring the love back?
I know that you've been waitin' so long
For it to come home again
Can we bring the love back?
I know that it's been way too long
You've always been home to me, always homeEmbed
